Address.label: Address
Address.value: C/O JINJIANG HENGDA CERAMICS CO., LTD FUJIAN, JINJIANG, 362261, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Antelope Enterprise Holdings Ltd is a manufacturer of ceramic tiles in China. Its ceramic tiles are used for exterior siding, interior flooring, and design in residential and commercial buildings. The company's products are Porcelain, Glazed, Glazed porcelain, Rustic, and Ultra-thin tiles which are sold under the Hengda or HD brand, the Hengdeli or HDL brand, TOERTO, WULIQIAO and Pottery Capital of Tang Dynasty brands.
